name: Block
description: On play: Prevent the "on hit" of the attack below this. You lose 1 stamina

name: Analyze
description:
You may play this when your adjacent to an opponent 
On play: Draw 2 cards unless your opponent plays an attack on top of this

name: Dash
description: On play: Move up to 2 hexes

name: Slash
description: Your opponents can only play blocks on top of this. On hit: Deal 1 damage

name: Feint
description: This can't be played on top of an attack. On hit: deal 1 damage

name: Center
description: On end: If you took no damage this attack, draw a card and gain 2 temporary stamina (this is spent before regular stamina)
Notes: This basically cycles then does nothing if you get hit. Maybe you get 2 temporary stamina

name: Parry
description: On end: If your opponent played no attacks on top of this, they discard a card and lose all stamina

name: Focus
description: On play: Your next card costs 1 less stamina to play

name: Inner Eye
description: On end: If you took no damage this attack, you draw a card and your opponent reveals 2 cards from their hand

name: Guard Break
description: Only play this on top of a block On hit: your opponent loses all stamina

name: Blue Samurai
description:
Before your attack: draw a card and recover 2 stamina. Then you may move 1 tile. This move costs 1 stamina if you're adjacent to an opponent.
Before any attack: You may pay 1 stamina to draw a card once

name: Green Samurai
description:
Before your attack: draw a card and recover 2 stamina. Then you may move 1 tile. This move costs 1 stamina if you're adjacent to an opponent.
Before any attack: You may pay 1 stamina to draw a card once

name: Red Samurai
description:
Before your attack: draw a card and recover 2 stamina. Then you may move 1 tile. This move costs 1 stamina if you're adjacent to an opponent.
Before any attack: You may pay 1 stamina to draw a card once

name: Yellow Samurai
description:
Before your attack: draw a card and recover 2 stamina. Then you may move 1 tile. This move costs 1 stamina if you're adjacent to an opponent.
Before any attack: You may pay 1 stamina to draw a card once
